TopicTitle: [MOD+STOCK] EMU DYNAMICS WARFARE CRAFT (some include bd amourey)

Articles.Content:
[B]EMU WARFARE CRAFT (some include bd amourey)[/B]


due to the rp rules on the new forum i have got rid of all rp

[COLOR=#333333][INDENT][COLOR=#333333][B][B][U][B]you are welcome to modify these crafts at your discretion just give me credit for the original work you are also welcome to rename them to a name of your choice but the same follows just give me credit
[/B][/U][/B][/B]
[U][B]mods[/B][/U]
[B]bd amourey
[SIZE=5]GROUND DIVISION [/SIZE][/B][B][SIZE=5]bd included in all[/SIZE][/B]

[/COLOR][imgur]xbrNx[/imgur][COLOR=#333333]

[B]hello, this this the ceo of Emu Dynamics we are proud to announce our MBT (main battle tank) it has standard armour and is armed with a 120mm abrams gun for A.T (anti tank) purposes and 20mm vulcan turret for A.I (anti infantry) it had a top speed of 21ms and is able to achieve this on most terrains
[/B][URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/i77lj753tntn8i1/MBT-Emu.craft?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/i77lj753tn...Emu.craft?dl=0[/URL][B]

LAATAV (Lightly Armoured All Terrain Assault Vehicle) this craft packs a powerful punch but has little to no armour it can achieve high speeds on most off road terrain but we have found one problem it tends to flip when you take high speed sharp turns [URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/twck0sj0uxnfqer/LAATAV%20EMU.craft?dl=0"]
https://www.dropbox.com/s/twck0sj0uxnfqer/LAATAV%20EMU.craft?dl=0[/URL]

the emu assault is a lighter more toned down version of the LAATAV no only is it more stable but it is faster and has a greater variety of weapons
[/B][URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/xtr4o9uzxwom0x8/The%20Emu%20Assualt.craft?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/xtr4o9uzxw...alt.craft?dl=0[/URL]t

[B]The Emu APC is by far our best yet with dynamic armour that can take a good punch, fast with a recorded top speed of 23ms it is armed with 30mm chain gun 2 50 cal turrets on the side and 6 hellfire anti ground missiles we have fixed all the previous problems with flipping not to mention its best feature the ability to carry 6 kerbals on the inside [/B]
[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/96xi6mk98zqg745/apc.craft?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/96xi6mk98z...apc.craft?dl=0[/URL]

[B]the ECL is a mutilple cruise missile luancher vecile it carries 8 large cruise missiles some say this is over the top i say its nesicery[/B]
[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/3a37sx0sk78yc54/Emu%20Crusie%20Luancher%20%28ECL%29.craft?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/3a37sx0sk7...%29.craft?dl=0[/URL]

[B]the Super LAATAV is a more armoured an better armoured version of my original laatav[/B]
[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/xmkxqcz0fxnatzc/SUPER%20LAATAV.craft?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/xmkxqcz0fx...TAV.craft?dl=0[/URL]
[B]the emu artilery vechile is a simple but effective support vechile it is armed with twin howitzers and can hit from great distances
[/B][URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/jzgiajgl2sbwing/art.craft?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/jzgiajgl2s...art.craft?dl=0[/URL]
[B]The Emu Light tank with dynamic armour that can take a good punch, fast with a recorded top speed of 23ms it is armed with a [/B][COLOR=#000000][FONT=Noto Sans][B]Oerlikon Millenium Turret, 50 cal turret, a howitzer and a missile rack that carries 6 hellfire missiles.[/B]
[/FONT][/COLOR]https://www.dropbox.com/s/p3i7hya9epw25qg/light%20tank%20with%20target%20ball.craft?dl=0[B]

hello, this this the ceo of Emu Dynamics we are proud to announce our new craft the SSLB (Super Sonic Light Bomber) this craft carries a somewhat powerful bomb load of six 500 pound bombs the SSLB has a top speed of 1400 ms it is medium ranged and has medium to high maneuverabillity it has a trans continental which makes it a versatile and adaptable to most situations [/B][/COLOR]
[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/54potvmf4nuvgv3/SSLB-Emu.craft?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/54potvmf4n...Emu.craft?dl=0[/URL]
[/B][B]
hello, this this the ceo of Emu Dynamics we are proud to announce our new craft the super emu our fast new fighter cable of [/B][B]reaching 600 ms it also has great [/B][COLOR=#333333][B]manoeuvrability[/B][/COLOR]
[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/y2srfs1tb8lsjud/The%20super%20Emu.craft?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/y2srfs1tb8...Emu.craft?dl=0[/URL]
[B]hello, this this the ceo of Emu Dynamics we are proud to announce our new craft the emu h (heavy) fighter it is longer range then our standard fighter and also can carry a larger load[/B]
[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/967up0dh7i1agm3/emu%20h%20fighter.craft?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/967up0dh7i...ter.craft?dl=0[/URL]
[B]the emu mk 43 dasher is our premier fighter plane it has rcs boosters to help with monvers (due to my ksp not bieng able to be backdated engines are not included)
[/B][URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/q7r3luu32enfrk9/The%20Emu%20f-43%20dasher.craft?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/q7r3luu32e...her.craft?dl=0[/URL][B]
The emu h bomber is our big bomber carrying 70, 500 pound bombs pound by 4 whiplash engines capable of braking the sound barrier once with a full load and twice once all bombs have been expended [/B][/COLOR]
[URL]https://www.dropbox.com/s/o9eskxmx04bd5s6/Emu%20h%20bomber.craft?dl=0[/URL]

The A.D.D (f) Or (Air Dropped Defence Fighter) is a very small fighter armed with just 2 sidewinders and 2 vulcans diesgned to be dropped from a larger plane like a bomber it has a top speed of 270 ms and it is still cable of taking off by itself
[URL]https://www.dropbox.com/s/h544mhluuim64cu/A_D_D%20%20%28F%29.craft?dl=0[/URL][COLOR=#333333][B]

[SIZE=5]SPACE DIVISION no bd in any space vechile[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR][imgur]pQ0GQ[/imgur][COLOR=#333333][B]

hello, this the ceo of Emu Dynamics we are proud to announce our new craft and our first spacecraft the hummingbird
[/B][B]10 light missiles and 1 large missile and one medium[/B]
[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/mrhmwmd0tjqyun5/Hummingbird-Emu.craft?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/mrhmwmd0tj...Emu.craft?dl=0[/URL]

[B]the emu light fighter is space combat craft but is strictly for fighter to fighter it has 4 anti fighter missiles and one anti large ship missile[/B]
[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/n75tp2f1s7x5af5/Emu%20light%20fighter.craft?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/n75tp2f1s7...ter.craft?dl=0[/URL]

[B]the mk 1 bumble bee is a super light drone fighter deigned for carriers [/B]
[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/m3tf10zg4oix37u/Mk%201%20Bumbble%20Bee.craft?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/m3tf10zg4o...Bee.craft?dl=0[/URL]

[B]the light support fighter is intended to go onto capital ships to help defend them from enemy fighters it has 3 anti fighter missiles [/B]
[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/xl7j4n6oamxbw6n/light%20support%20fighter.craft?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/xl7j4n6oam...ter.craft?dl=0[/URL]

[B]The Emu space bomber is a pure anti capital ship craft it has 4 capital ship armour busting torpedos and 8 standard anti ship missiles
[/B][URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/p67uh4senas2rq9/Emu%20space%20bomber.craft?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/p67uh4sena...ber.craft?dl=0[/URL]

[B]the light atmosphere fighter is purposed to fight in low atmosphere and gravity it has vtol features it has wheels and landing gear for any situation (un armed due to the lack of rules for this type of craft.[/B]
[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/dh4ngqt768scd0v/light%20atmosphere%20fighter.craft?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/dh4ngqt768...ter.craft?dl=0[/URL]

[B]The emu advance torpedo bomber is our premier anti capital ship armed with 4 armour buster torpedos and our new type 5 anti capital ship torpedos[/B]
[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/4x9wpbnjrym4ouu/Emu%20torpedo%20bonber.craft?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/4x9wpbnjry...ber.craft?dl=0[/URL]

[/COLOR]
[B]the blade fighter is one of our most amazing intresting space fighters yet armed with 4 anti capital ship missiles and a very special feature if all missiles run out and there is no way out it is equiped with a ramming wing
[/B][URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/6ueidcd4oekznxq/BLade.craft?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/6ueidcd4oe...ade.craft?dl=0[/URL]

[/COLOR][B]the wasp is light/medium space fighter armed with 8 light peashooter missiles it has a power house of 3 xeon engines[/B][COLOR=#333333]

[B]The LSSF or light space strike fighter is one of our best space fighters it is large enough to fight by itself but small enough to be a large carrier fighter its is armed with 6 emus beak guided torpedos it has a power plant of 6 ion engines with plenty of xeon it also has large amount solar panals so it will never r[/B][/COLOR][B]un out of power[/B][/INDENT]
[/COLOR][COLOR=#333333][INDENT][COLOR=#333333]
[URL="https://www.dropbox.com/s/3bmtkafulpil5tf/the%20emu%20lssf.craft?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/3bmtkafulp...ssf.craft?dl=0[/URL]
[/COLOR][COLOR=#333333]
The assualt pod is our best drop pod able to land on any surface it come in 3 versions (all carry one kerbal)

AA version comes with 2 50 cal turrets and 4 sidewinder missiles

s version is completely un armed
[/COLOR]https://www.dropbox.com/s/2wmo3jmpg1a90k7/Assualt%20Pod%20s.craft?dl=0[COLOR=#333333]
